extendedInfo.description: Everyday a new space travel related image, from NASA official image of the day direct to your android device.Features:* Multiple screen sizes support* Landscape layout support* Refresh button, so you can force a refresh* Internet connection detection before trying to get data* Set the image of the day as wallpaper for your android deviceCompletly free!New features coming soon.Minimum requirements: * android 2.1 operating system running device with internet accessSuggestions and/or bug reporting: codigoalvo@gmail.comcodigoalvowww.codigoalvo.com.br

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Only needs confirmation before changing wallpaper! ;) But goes simply straight to the point.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: UI sucks.. refresh force closes... no options whatsoever..
reviews.author: sachin prabhu
